Despues de tantos a√±os sigue siendo un juegazo (mejor con Mods para jugar offline), lo recomiendo mucho, aun hay gente en el online, y vale la pena jugarlo en tus ratos libres cuando estes aburrido de lo demas.
este jogo e muito bom mas deviam por mais servidores

Needless to say, I've been playing this game for a very long time. It's hard to estimate when I started, probably around 2008. This honestly is a timeless game. I keep coming back after breaks and it never honestly gets old. So many servers with different gamemodes and things to do, it's kinda overwhelming at first. Zombies, Deathmatch, Competitive, Bunnyhop, Surf, Trikz, Minigames, and more. I've grown up with this game and it is my most played game by far. Definitely your money's worth if what I listed has you interested. Community can be a bit cancerous, as it is considered one of the most toxic by WatchMojo. You can easily mute everyone though, so if that tickles your fancy, you are happily allowed.

10/10

My knife is mighty in your back and i will outrun you! I will sparkle! And you will cease to advance! 
(Highly recommend you download my world!)
